title: Sloe gin fizz
description: With the addition of American cream soda, this sloe gin cocktail is very sweet and drinkable.

default: 1 tsp sugar syrup (also sold as gomme syrup)

steps: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in the gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup and stir well. Top up with cream soda.
Garnish with a blackberry and a sprig of mint. Serve.
